thread.title_full: a short stopover in Paris- perfect location close to transport - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: travelforsnow
title: a short stopover in Paris- perfect location close to transport
text:
a short walk from Gare De Lyon station and metro station.
clean, modern rooms and very friendly staff that were more than happy to provide sightseeing advice, maps and recommendations.
They were performing renovations on the floor above, but we did not notice any noise or disruptions.
Room Tip: ask for a street facing room, the rear ones overlook some ugly apartments See more room tips
